mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.course_id AS "courseId", a.status AS "status", a.duration AS "duration", a.study_start_time AS "studyStartTime", a.study_end_time AS "studyEndTime", a.grade AS "grade", a.grade_date AS "gradeDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_study( id, course_id, status, duration, study_start_time, study_end_time, grade, grade_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{courseId}, #{status}, #{duration}, #{studyStartTime}, #{studyEndTime}, #{grade}, #{gradeDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE course_study SET course_id = #{courseId}, status = #{status}, duration = #{duration}, study_start_time = #{studyStartTime}, study_end_time = #{studyEndTime}, grade = #{grade}, grade_date = #{gradeDate}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate} WHERE id = #{id}
